name: MxLogin
tagline: Improve your registration/signup pages with links to user's email provider inbox.
body: # MXLogin Improve your registration/signup pages with links to user's email provider inbox. # Supported email providers * Gmail * Yahoo * Hotmail * Outlook * AOL * Mail.com * Mail.ru * Mailinator * T-Com.hr * Iskon.hr # How to install (composer) composer require atomasevic/mxlogin or add to your project's composer.json "require": { "atomasevic/mxlogin": "dev-master" } # How to use search($email);
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
